ValidationRule.description: Built as part of Phase 1 enhancement
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( NS_RACFUserID__c ), RecordType.Name!='NS Internal', ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'RIT'), OR( ISPICKVAL(NS_Type__c,'Not Qualified'), ISPICKVAL(NS_Type__c, 'Training')), ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide RACF/User ID prior to closing the Case.
